com.marcospassos.phpserializer.adapter

Class ReferableObjectAdapter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marcospassos.phpserializer.adapter.ReferableObjectAdapter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of object.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    TypeAdapter<T>

    public class ReferableObjectAdapter<T>
extends Object
implements TypeAdapter<T>
    Decorates adapters for handling object references. This adapter checks whether an object has already been serialized. If it is the case, it serializes the reference instead of the object itself. Otherwise, it sets the reference to the object in the context for later use before calling the decorated adapter.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Marcos Passos
